title: Implementing Queue Using Linked List
description: In computer science, a queue is a collection of entities that are maintained in a sequence and can be modified by the addition of entities at one end of the sequence and the removal of entities from the other end of the sequence. It is also known as a FIFO (first in, first out) data structure. In this challenge, we will implement a queue using a linked list.

meta.title: Queue | Linked List | Data Structure
meta.description: Learn how to implement a queue using a linked list in computer science. Understand the FIFO (first-in, first-out) data structure and its practical applications.
meta.keywords: queue, linked list, data structure, FIFO, computer science, programming

verify.name: Verify if all tests are passed
verify.hint: Please make sure you have the correct output format.

i18n.title: 使用链表实现队列
i18n.description: 在计算机科学中，队列是一组按顺序维护的实体集合，可通过在序列一端添加实体以及从序列另一端移除实体来进行修改。它也被称为先进先出（FIFO，First In, First Out）数据结构。在本次挑战中，我们将使用链表来实现一个队列。

meta.title: 队列 | 链表 | 数据结构
meta.description: 了解如何在计算机科学中使用链表实现队列。理解先进先出（FIFO）数据结构及其实际应用。
meta.keywords: 队列, 链表, 数据结构, 先进先出, 计算机科学, 编程
